Jo Peninsulas 5:45 PM
Earth Day 2023
Matthew, EarthDay 2023 is scheduled to be the biggest environmental event in history. With Fortune 50s, hundreds of SMBs, and industry leading tree planting groups already joining forces, we’re making history and we’d like you to be a part of it. 

What’s the best way to get some time on the calendar to discuss Earth Day 2023?

Best regards,
Jo

https://bit.ly/Meet-With-ForTreesClub
MAR 2
Matthew Coorsh sent the following messages at 4:01 AM

Matthew Coorsh 4:01 AM
Hi Jo, thanks so much for your note. As you might imagine we get dozens of inquiries every day. Perhaps you could provide a little more detail with respect to how you envision working with Samsung prior to a setting up a meeting.

Thanks,
Matt
